mapper.select: select * from car order by carid asc
select cp.prodid, p.prodnm, cp.prodcnt as carprodcnt, p.prodcnt as prodcnt from product p inner join carprod cp on p.prodid = cp.prodid inner join car c on cp.carid = c.carid where cp.carid=#{carid}

select cp.carid, cg.catenm, p.prodnm, cp.prodcnt as carprodcnt from product p inner join carprod cp on p.prodid = cp.prodid inner join car c on cp.carid = c.carid inner join category cg on p.cateid = cg.cateid
